full_text: Q Where and when were you born? A Shantung, China, April 14, 1904. Q Of what country are you a citizen? A China. Q Where were your parents born? A In the same place. Q Have either of your parents ever lived in the United States? A No. Q Do you in your own behalf make any claim to United States citizenship? A No. Q Of what country is your wife a citizen? A United States. Q What is her name? A Thelma B. Liu. Q When and where were you married? A Peiping, China, January 22, 1937. Q Have you ever been married before? A This is my second marriage. Q When, where and to whom were you married the first time? A July 1921, to Miss Jung, (Li), in Shangtung, China. Q When was this marriage terminated? A 1922. Q How was it terminated? A She died. Q Do you have any documents to show termination of your prior marriage? A No. Q Did you have any children by the first marriage? A No. Q Do you have any children by your second marriage? A Yes. Q Please give their names, place of birth and date of birth? A My son Chelcie B. Liu, born December 30, 1940 and my daughters name is Elaine May Liu, born November 19, 1943, both born in Peiping, China. Q Where are your children at the present time? A In Waubay, South Dakota. Q When did they enter the United States? A Last July 1946. 2/1/47 -3- 1300-47068
